room_title: Escape room "C.S.I." by Clue Pursuit in Springfield (MO)
review: We had a blast! Myself, my daughter, and 2 of her friends in the CSI room, and it was great. I never realized you can have fun and be stressed at the same time.

room_title: Escape room "C.S.I." by Clue Pursuit in Springfield (MO)
review: Eva did an awesome job explaining the concept and setting up the scenario for the CSI room! We enjoyed the level of difficulty and the fun clues. Will make this a regular event!

room_title: Escape room "C.S.I." by Clue Pursuit in Springfield (MO)
review: This was the most fun! My sister, husband, grandmother and I went in doing the CSI room and we all had a blast figuring out the clues and escaping the room! We had 2 minutes and 13 seconds to spare! Whew! We are wanting to do all of them now! Staff was pleasant and we enjoyed ourselves a lot!
